::KitKat/DarkMouse::

KitKat::
She looked at Megatron. "I don't know.  It sounds crazy, but I can 
hear Phobia.  He says to go to his ship and he can help us." She 
thought she was loosing her logic circuits.  She stepped back from 
Megatron and bumped against Rowdy. She krinkled her nose and knew 
that that was a bad move.  She stepped forward and stood closer to 
Megatron.  She turned and looked at Rowdy.

DarkMouse::
She looked at Black Aracnia. "I don't know what to do about it. Would 
my body reject it with the energon in it?" she had a worried look on 
her face.  She wanted to go and fight, not sit in bed for a week.
"Black Aracnia, could you just send me that drone you spoke of or 
someone. I need to get to walking around, I need to be able to 
transform again.  I want to go kick some Maximal butt as soon as 
possable.  Not sit here and be a burden on you and everyone."  She 
moved to the edge of the bed. She scooted off and stood there holding 
onto the side of the bed.  Her legs felt stronger.  She smiled 
thinking that she was getting better.  But she shakes returned. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron gives a menaceing look at both his minions, hands 
still raised, 
> "Phobia? I wouldnt trust him with a protohuman and you want us to 
go to his 
> ship? What has gotten into you Kitkat, because Im going to let 
Rowdy Wolf 
> beat it out of you in a minute."
> 
>     Black Aracnia looked at Darkmouse. "Well, I suppose we could 
add some 
> Mech to the energon in your system. But, We'll need to find a 
donnater...."
